channel.title: Lua: news
channel.description: What's happening in the Lua world.

item.title: Lua 5.2.3 released
item.description: Lua 5.2.3 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.2.2.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2013 held in Toulouse
item.description: Lua Workshop 2013 held in Toulouse, France, as part of Le Capitole du Libre.

item.title: 20 years of Lua
item.description: We commemorate 20 years of the first version of Lua today.

item.title: Roberto receives award for Lua
item.description: Roberto Ierusalimschy, chief architect of Lua, received the Scientific Merit Award of the Brazilian Computer Society for his work on Lua.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2013 to be held in Toulouse
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2013 will be held in Toulouse, France, on November 23-24, 2013, as part of Le Capitole du Libre.

item.title: Programming in Lua now available as an e-book
item.description: The book "Programming in Lua" (3rd edition) is now available as an e-book through Feisty Duck.

channel.item:
Roberto gives an invited talk at WWW 2013 http://www2013.org/program/why-do-we-need-multiple-languages/
Roberto gives an invited talk "Lua versus Javascript: Why do we need multiple languages?" at WWW 2013, the 22nd International World Wide Web Conference.
Mon, 13 May 2013 14:44:30 -0300
</
